response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant $10,000 value to you. Considering this, I am offering you the chance to purchase the product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you choose to accept, not only will you benefit from immediate savings, but also gain access to a product that offers unparalleled advantages. If you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 9500}
